name: Disk 15
description:
Disk 15 is a compilation of 15 games on a single disk. Most games are board-game conversions, but also some arcade games and a drawing program are included in the collection.
  • 3D Noughts & Crosses
  • Sliding Blocks
  • Solitaire
  • 49er
  • Hangman
  • MasterMind
  • Othello
  • Draughts
  • Astro Dodge
  • STDoodler (drawing program)
  • Heli Bomber
  • Sub Hunter
  • Rally Driver
  • Balloon Crazy
  • Diamante Sid
Control is very different through the games: some board games are controlled by the mouse, others by positional arguments typed on the keyboard, while the arcade games are controlled by keyboard only (no joystick), but all with different key mappings, which cannot be changed. Most games can only be left by resetting the computer. None of the games feature sound effects or music, only the keyboard ping of the operating system is present.

shot.caption: Title screen with menu
3D Noughts & Crosses: the playfield
Crosses from the player, circles from the AI
Sliding blocks: reorder the numbers by moving single blocks
The colors have no meaning
Solitaire is mouse controlled
Clearing the board
I cannot remove more. Still no "Quit" or "Replay" button/choice appears
49er: type positions to move
Better do not type in "EXIT"
Hangman: the start
Cyan are all typed letters, green the ones in the word
At least I can quit after my failure
Mastermind with text input control
Othello is also controlled by keyboard input
Moving stones
Astro Dodge: you cannot shoot. Avoid the asteroids by moving left and right and gain points for each asteroid leaving the playfield at the bottom border
Left-Right is done via both Shift keys btw. It didn't helped me
ST Doodler is a drawing program. Disagree on the credit information does not help in anything
Well, then draw something with blocks and points and some other elements HiSoft Basic is offering for drawing
Heli Bomber title screen.
The helicopter moves automatically from left to right, loosing height on each turn.
Use bombs to destroy the sky scrapers before you crash into them on further turns
I missed the two very high ones on the left
I am still wondering which evil persons are living in those houses that I need to bomb them
Sub Hunter title screen
Your ship is moving automatically from the left to right. Drop bombs and avoid enemy missiles
I am getting the last two evil submarines (which move from left to right)
Somehow this reminds me of the skyscraper shooting
Rally Driver title screen
The rally is in a maze
Luckily they found another car!
Balloon Crazy is featuring moving platforms: avoid the wholes in them
Diamante Sid title screen
Somehow I have to do something here
A reminder after the game ended suddenly. Well...
Information screen of the compilation
